[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢---------------------------------------------------------------ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢

[i][b]In this state-of-the-art adaptation of H.G. Wells' science fiction novel, scientist and inventor Alexander Hartdegen (Guy Pierce) is determined to prove that time travel is possible. However, his determination is turned to desperation when his life is struck by a devastating tragedy. Now with the power to travel through time, he sets off on a journey 800,000 years into the future and discovers that mankind has been divided between the hunter and the hunted! Co-starring Jeremy irons, Samantha Mumba and the terrifying Morlocks, The Time Machine is an adventure with its finger on the fast forward button.
[/b][/i]
